description: This table contains the auditing information related to the follow up findings.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUDIT_FOLLOW_UP_FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the result finding that is the current value of the result tracking finding follow-up. Whenever ORD_RSLT_TRK_FND_FOLLOWUP.FOLLOWUP_FINDING_ID is changed, this column will store the current value.
